channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 21:33 Failure in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 21:33 Failure in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
